The user launches a mass of fire at their opponent. When used through autonomous puppets, they can fire it in rapid succession, without hand seals.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 19, page 22</ref> However, continuous firing can lead them to overheat, and thus disable them until they have cooled down.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 19, pages 30-31</ref>

== Trivia ==
* [[Boruto Uzumaki]] could perform this technique through his [[Shinobi Gauntlet]], whereas [[Ao]] — with a mechanism embedded in his chest.
* While in the manga, the technique is used as a projectile blast, in the anime and movie, the technique is used more like a flamethrower.
